topic.title: Hospital Discharge Studies Summary Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11493-4" Hospital Discharge Studies Summary (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-DS-45)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "HOSPITAL DISCHARGE STUDIES SUMMARY"
